snippet: Turkey’s president accused the European Union of not keeping its commitments, and he suggested he might allow migrants to cross Turkish borders again....
abstract: Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan threatens to open border and allow flood of migrants into Europe, apparently responding to move to suspend talks on Turkey's membership in European Union.

byline.original: By SAFAK TIMUR and ROD NORDLAND
byline.contributor: James Kanter contributed reporting from Brussels, and Alison Smale from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: Turkey’s president accused the European Union of not keeping its commitments, and he suggested he might allow migrants to cross Turkish borders again.

headline.main: Erdogan Threatens to Let Migrant Flood Into Europe Resume
headline.print_headline: Angry at European Action, Turkey Threatens to Let Migrant Flood Resume

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
